result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Adam Lee Gaulthier

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Adam L Gaulthier appeared by video.  Attorney Michael B Plaisted appeared by video for Adam L Gaulthier.  Attorney Tristan Bednarek appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
Scheduling conference held. Defense requests Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates. Any witness lists, special jury instructions, and motion in limine to be filed 48 hours before the final pretrial date. Court orders case adjourned for final pretrial and jury trial in Branch 29.
Final pre-trial scheduled for December 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Jury trial scheduled for January 9, 2023 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Adam L Gaulthier appeared by video.  Attorney Michael B Plaisted appeared by video for Adam L Gaulthier.  Prosecuting attorney Tristan J. Bednarek appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Scheduling conference held. Defense counsel needs a global offer from the State and requests a scheduling conference. Case is adjourned to Br. 29.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Adam L Gaulthier appeared by video.  Attorney Michael B Plaisted in court for Adam L Gaulthier.  Prosecuting attorney Tristan J. Bednarek in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for Status Conference. Defense counsel needs discovery and an offer from the State and requests a scheduling conference.  Case is adjourned to Br. 29.
Scheduling conference scheduled for September 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed. Order Appointing Counsel
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Supervision Report 8.24.22

Court ordered no contact with NMH.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4.
  Court ordered Defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
  No possession of any controlled substance without a valid prescription.

Defendant Adam Lee Gaulthier in court with attorney William Scott Nelson.  Defendant Adam Lee Gaulthier in custody.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer, Branch 29. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 25, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
